info.title: Plixus ERS API 1.0
info.description:
REST API for the Embedded Room Server on the CU.

# Introduction

Here comes a small introduction text about the API

get.summary: Event when an intercom conversation was requested
Event when a seat has accepted an intercom request
Event when an intercom conversation has ended
Event when an intercom conversation was canceled
Event when intercom capability was enabled for a seat
Event when the intercom capability was disabled for a seat
Returns the active configuration

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

put.summary: Uses the configuration passed with this call as the active configuration

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

put.summary: Set or clear the connection of a video input group to a video stream.

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

put.summary: Set or clear the connection between a video stream and a video selector group.

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request
An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request
An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request
An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

put.summary: Overwrite an existing configuration

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request
An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

put.summary: Make a video stream available for delegates.

400.description: stream does not exist

delete.summary: Make a video stream unavailable for delegates.

400.description: stream does not exist

get.summary: Get the seats which have enabled intercom capability
Get the booths which have enabled intercom capability

put.summary: Enable intercom for a seat
Enable intercom for a booth

get.summary: Get a list of active conversations
Gets an ordered list of all seats which are requesting to speak.

200.description: Ordered list of seats which are requesting to speak.

post.summary: Request to start a conversation with a seat

parameters.name: fromSeat
parameters.description: Seat ID that requests the conversation

parameters.name: toSeat
parameters.description: Seat ID that receives the conversation request

post.summary: Request to start a conversation with a seat in a booth

parameters.name: fromSeat
parameters.description: Seat ID that requests the conversation

parameters.name: toBooth
parameters.description: Booth ID that receives the conversation request

parameters.name: seat
parameters.description: Seat ID that accepts a conversation request. Can be a seat inside a booth.

post.summary: Start a conversation between two seats

parameters.name: fromSeat
parameters.description: Seat ID of first seat in the conversation

parameters.name: toSeat
parameters.description: Seat ID of second seat in the conversation

delete.summary: End a conversation, or decline/cancel a conversation request.

parameters.name: seat
parameters.description: Seat ID that ends the call

post.summary: Get a client id for long polling requests

get.summary: Make a long polling request for the next event

parameters.name: client
parameters.description: Unique id of client that makes the request (retrieved by call to connect)

get.summary: Get list of notification modules for client

parameters.name: module
parameters.description: Name of module to unsubscribe from

parameters.name: module
parameters.description: Name of module to subscribe to

get.summary: Event when the room conference settings have changed
Event when the room's default conference settings have changed
Get the discussion state of all seats in the room
Get the current conference settings of the room

put.summary: Change the current conference settings of the room

get.summary: Get the default conference settings of the room

put.summary: Change the default conference settings of the room
Move to the previous speaker

get.summary: Gets an ordered list of all the seats which are currently speaking.

200.description: Ordered list of all the seats which are currently speaking.

delete.summary: Clear all delegates and chairmen that are speaking or requesting to speak
Clear the delegates that are currently speaking

put.summary: Move to the next speaker

get.summary: Event when the discussion state of a seat has changed
Gets an ordered list of all seats which are requesting to speak.

200.description: Ordered list of seats which are requesting to speak.

delete.summary: Clear the seats that are currently requesting to speak

get.summary: Gets an ordered list of all the seats which are currently requesting to reply.

200.description: Ordered list of all the seats which are currently requesting to reply.

get.summary: Event when the speaker list has changed

200.description: ordered list of seats which are currently speaking.

get.summary: Event when the request list has changed

200.description: ordered list of seats which are currently requesting to speak.

get.summary: Event when the reply list has changed

200.description: ordered list of seats which are currently requesting to reply.

get.summary: Get the discussion state of one seat

put.summary: Toggle the microphone of a seat on / off
Toggle the reply state of a seat
Toggle the request state of a seat

get.summary: Get all buttons in the room

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

put.summary: Change some buttons in the room

parameters.name: buttons
parameters.description: Buttons to change with their new state

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

post.summary: Add some custom buttons in the room

parameters.name: buttons
parameters.description: Custom buttons to add (button type should be custom)

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

delete.summary: Remove some custom buttons in the room

parameters.name: buttons
parameters.description: Custom buttons to remove (button type should be custom)

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

get.summary: Get some buttons in the room based on seat number

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

post.summary: Push some buttons in the room

parameters.name: buttons
parameters.description: Buttons to change with their new state

parameters.name: loopback
parameters.description: True when cu should handle the button presses internally

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

get.summary: Get all leds in the room

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

put.summary: Change some leds in the room

parameters.name: leds
parameters.description: Leds to change with their new state

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

get.summary: Get some leds in the room based on seat number

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

get.summary: Get some leds in the room based on led button type

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

get.summary: Get some leds in the room based on led device type

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

get.summary: Get some buttons in the room based on button type

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

get.summary: Get some leds in the room based on led type

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

get.summary: Get the active interpretation configuration data
Get a list of listeners per language channel in the room
Get the current qualities of all language channels in the room
Get the current state of all desks in the room
Get the name of the floor channel that is used for the room

put.summary: Change the name of the floor channel that is used for the room

get.summary: Get a list of languages defined for the room

put.summary: Change the list of languages defined for the room

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description: List of languages to change towards

get.summary: Get a list of interpretation configurations for the room

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Data about the new interpretation configuration to create

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

put.summary: Update the details of a specific interpretation configuration in the room

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Data about the interpretation configuration to update

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

delete.summary: Delete an existing interpretation configuration from the room

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the interpretation configuration to delete

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

post.summary: Change the active interpretation configuration for the room

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the interpretation configuration to change to

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

get.summary: Event when the auto floor state has changed
Event when the listeners to a language channel has changed
Event when the active interpretation configuration has changed

Event when the active output channel of a desk has changed
Event when the active relay channel of a desk has changed

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the audio routing configuration to update

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Data about the audio routing configuration to update

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the audio routing configuration to delete

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the audio routing configuration to change to

Event when the state of an audio routing node has changed
Get the active configuration data

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request

get.summary: Get the current recording state
Get the current recording settings

inputGroup.description: Specifies which input group is connected to the stream. Equals -1 when no group connected.

fromSeat.description: ID of seat that initiates the conversation

toSeat.description: ID of seat that accepts the conversation

startDateTime.description: Start date and time of conversation

fromSeat.description: ID of seat that requests the conversation

toType.description: Type of the receiver of the call

toId.description: Seat or booth ID of the receiver of the call

fromSeat.description: Seat ID that requests the call

toType.description: Type of the receiver of the call

toId.description: Seat or booth ID of the receiver of the call

fromSeat.description: Seat ID that requested the call

toSeat.description: Seat ID that accepted the call

fromSeat.description: Seat ID that requested the call

toSeat.description: Seat ID that accepted the call

seat.description: Seat ID that canceled the call

id.description: Id of the booth or seat
Id of the booth or seat

moduleName.description: Name of the module where the event occurred

timestamp.description: Date and time when the event occurred

isSubscribed.description: True when the client is subscribed to this module

SeatButton.description: A button somewhere on a seat

seatNumber.description: Number of seat where te button is located

button.description: Definition of the button located on the seat

isPressEnabled.description: True when button press is enabled

isReleaseEnabled.description: True when button release is enabled

index.description: Index of the button if there is more than one button

name.description: Name of the button when it's a custom button

seatNumber.description: Number of the seat where the led is located

deviceType.description: Type of device when led type is 'Device'

index.description: Zero based index of the led if there is more than one led

onColor.description: Color to be used when led is on

offColor.description: Color to be used when led is off

value.description: Hex RGB value of the color

isSlowdownActive.description: True when someone has requested to slow down

isLocked.description: True when interpretation configuration is locked for editing

isAudienceIndicationEnabled.description: True when audience indication is enabled

audienceIndicationUpdateInterval.description: Interval in seconds to update the audience indication (when enabled)

intraBoothConfiguration.description: The interpretation mode configuration of desks between booths

interBoothInterpretationMode.description: The interpretation mode of desks within a booth

isSlowdownEnabled.description: True when slow down button is enabled

channels.description: The language channels defined in this interpretation configuration

name.description: Name of the audio routing configuration

description.description: Description of the audio routing configuration

isLocked.description: True when configuration is locked for editing

isMultipleFloor.description: True when configuration has multiple floors

AutoGainReduction.title: Root Type for AutoGainReduction
AutoGainReduction.description: The root of the AutoGainReduction type's schema.

AuxLevel.title: Root Type for AuxLevel
AuxLevel.description: The root of the AuxLevel type's schema.

AuxLevels.title: Root Type for AuxLevels
AuxLevels.description: The root of the AuxLevels type's schema.

RecordingState.title: Root Type for RecordingState
RecordingState.description: The root of the RecordingState type's schema.

state.description: Reflects the state of the storage.

fullSize.description: The full capacity of the storage in kilobytes (0 if not connected)

freeSize.description: The remaining capacity of the storage in kilobytes (0 if not connected)

storageType.description: The storage type on which the files are stored

bitRate.description: The bit rate to be used for recording

autoDelete.description: Auto delete oldest files when no space left

autoSplit.description: Auto split recordings into separate files

autoSplitTime.description: Time (in seconds) after which an audio recording will be split into a new file

channels.description: Channels to be recorded (identified by system channel ID)

MessageToSeatsModel.title: Root Type for MessageToSeatsModel
MessageToSeatsModel.description: Model for sending message to number of seats

message.description: Content of the message that should be displayed

beep.description: True when audible beep should be played

seats.description: List of seat numbers where the message should be sent to

seatNumber.description: Number of seat where delegate is seated

MessageToBoothsModel.title: Root Type for MessageToSeatsModel
MessageToBoothsModel.description: Model for sending message to number of seats

message.description: Content of the message that should be displayed

beep.description: True when audible beep should be played

booths.description: List of booth numbers where the message should be sent to

SeatUnit.description: Limited info about unit on seat

numberOfSeats.description: Number of seats in the room

SeatUnitsChanged.description: Units of a seat have changed

SeatLabelChanged.description: Label of a seat has changed

SeatRoleChanged.description: Role of a seat has changed

SeatStateChanged.description: State of a seat has changed

SeatCapability.title: Root Type for SeatCapability
SeatCapability.description: The root of the SeatCapability type's schema.

Desk.title: Root Type for Desk
Desk.description: The root of the Desk type's schema.

seat.description: Seat that is located on desk

Booth.description: Booth where translation is done by interpreters for certain language

desks.description: Desks that are part of the booth

seat.description: Number of the seat to place at the desk

length.description: Size of the resource file in bytes

RoomLayoutNode.title: Root Type for RoomLayoutNode
RoomLayoutNode.description: Node in room layout that gives position (x, y) to a seat in the room

x.description: X coordinate in number of pixels of node

y.description: Y coordinate in number of pixels of node

width.description: Width in pixels of the node

height.description: Height in pixels of the node

seat.description: Number of the seat that the node is referencing

RoomLayoutBackground.title: Root Type for RoomLayoutBackground
RoomLayoutBackground.description: The root of the RoomLayoutBackground type's schema.

resourceId.description: Id of resource that contains the background image

width.description: Width in pixels of the background image

height.description: Height in pixels of the background image

width.description: Width in pixels of the room layout

height.description: Height in pixels of the room layout

nodes.description: Nodes in the room that give a position to seats

id.description: Unique identifier of the voting session

startTime.description: Start date and time of the voting session

endTime.description: End date and time of the voting session

votes.description: Votes that were cast during voting session

options.description: Voting options that are available during voting session

Vote.description: Vate cast during a voting session

seat.description: Seat that has casted the vote

notVoted.description: Number of participants that did not vote

VotingOptionResult.title: Root Type for VotingOptionResult
VotingOptionResult.description: Result for a specific voting option

result.description: Number of votes for this option

VotingOption.description: Voting option that can be voted for

color.description: Color of the voting option (hex value)

abstain.description: True when this counts as abstain vote

options.description: Voting options available for voting session

firstDnsServer.description: First DNS Server (empty when using dhcp)

secondDnsServer.description: Second DNS server (empty when using dhcp)

AutoGainReductionChanged.description: Event for audio auto gain reduction changes
